sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const OrderDetails = ({ order }: any) => { return (

Order ID:

{order.orderId}

Order Date:

{new Date(order.orderDate).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", })}

Status:

{order.orderStatus}

Full Name:

{order.fullname}

Shipping Address:

{order.shippingAddress}

Phone:

{order.number}

Order Amount:

{order.orderAmount}

Total Discount:

{order.totalDiscount}

Order Total:

{order.orderTotal}

Cart ID:

{order.cartId}

Seller:

{order.seller.businessUsername}

Customer:

{order.customer.username}

Transaction ID:

{order.transactionId}

Created At:

{new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", })}

Updated At:

{new Date(order.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", })}

Products:

{order.products.map((product: any) => (
Product Name:

{product.product.productName}

Quantity:

{product.quantity}

Price:

{product.price}

Discounted Price:

{product.discountedPrice}

))}
); }; export default OrderDetails;
